Key Match Events: South Africa's David Miller and Aiden Markram both hit half-centuries.
Lungi Ngidi took 4 wickets for 29 runs.
Wayne Parnell took 3 wickets for 15 runs.
Suryakumar Yadav scored 68 runs off 40 balls.
Virat Kohli dropped a catch of Aiden Markram at 35 runs.
Hardik Pandya dismissed Aiden Markram, breaking a dangerous partnership.
R. Ashwin dismissed Tristan Stubbs in a crucial over.
Arshdeep Singh dismissed Quinton de Kock and Rilee Rossouw early in the innings.
Mohammed Shami took the wicket of South African skipper Temba Bavuma.
Lungi Ngidi dismissed Rohit Sharma, KL Rahul, and Virat Kohli in quick succession.
Pre-Game Insights: India opted to bat against South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2022.
Post-Match Reflections: Virat Kohli commented on focusing on the next game despite the tough day.
Lungi Ngidi expressed that winning the award and helping his country win was one of his biggest dreams.
Rohit Sharma reflected on the defeat, stating that conditions were not an excuse and emphasized the need for consistency.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match took place in Perth, Australia.
India managed to score 133 runs after losing 9 wickets.
South Africa needed 134 runs in 20 overs to win and achieved it with 5 wickets in hand.
